channel.title: My Nikola Site
channel.description: This is a demo site for Nikola.

item.title: It's Here!
item.dc:creator: Nikola Tesla
item.description:
We are pleased to announce the alpha release of Yellowco.in to the wild. After six months of development, unit testing, and deployment practice, we are finally ready for the first round of live testing. Thank you all for the wait, and please let us know of any issues that come up. Happy buying!

-- The Yellowco.in Team
